text: 5|94|satyaviśvāsikaḷē, niṅṅaḷuṭe kaikaḷkeāṇṭuṁ śūlaṅṅaḷ keāṇṭuṁ vēṭṭayāṭippiṭikkāvunna vidhattiluḷḷa valla jantukkaḷuṁ mukhēna allāhu niṅṅaḷe parīkṣikkuka tanne ceyyuṁ. adr̥śyamāya nilayil allāhuve bhayappeṭunnavare avan vērtiriccaṟiyān vēṇṭiyatre at‌. vallavanuṁ atin śēṣaṁ atikramaṁ kāṇiccāl avann vēdanayēṟiya śikṣayuṇṭāyirikkuṁ
